header_text: You are volunteering at a community event and notice two old friends who you have not seen in a while. They come up to say hi as they are passing. They probably think that you are selfless.

elements.Text: Do your friends think that you are kind for volunteering?

elements.name: You are volunteering at a community event and notice two old friends who you have not seen in a while. They come up to say hi as they are passing. They probably think that you are selfless._Social Situations_comp_question
